description:
• SEO (Search Engine Optimization) Basics - Better position on Google,
  • Google advertising, Facebook ads and customer acquisition through LinkedIn
  • Target Audience Definition - get the right people to your website

Learn important basics that help to increase online sales and get you new clients, instantly!

A lot of business owners make the mistake not to target the right audience with their marketing. That can be an expensive waste of money! We help you to spend you money wisely!

There are easy ways to get a better ranking on Google, which is important to get traffic to your website - do you know these easy ways? Basic SEO (Search Engine Optimization) knowledge can give you an advantage over your competitor.

We will introduce SEO Tools that experts use every day! Easy to use and great to review the work of your marketing agency or marketing department.

We help you to understand what your SEO Agency is talking about when they tell you e.g Backlinks are important! Your website must be mobile friendly. The PageSpeed of your site must be improved! You need unique content!

What is the best advertising platform for your business?

  • Facebook,
  • LinkedIn or
  • Google advertisements?

Find out in this course. We even give you ideas what your advertisements should look like!

Presentation videos and slides from Daniel, the German Google Guy. Including Q & A from the live audience!
title: SEO, Facebook, LinkedIn & Google Ads - new clients, fast!
